title: TFT cheating
body:
I mean, just gotta play it to notice its obvious af.
But the real question is this:
What injectors/cheats are people running? Since everyone else is runnin em, theres no reason I shouldn't be able to. 

100% yordle evade (I know, caps 60%, interesting right?)
3* buy barely round 10.
Multiple items every round (like 100% from EACH mob)
passive lifesteal

I know im not the only one noticing it, and i can tell you know people will defend this, we all know it.

replies.body: Your joking right? All this would be decided server side not client side.
Theres always one to defend cheats

Scepticism about a stated claim and defending the obvious bad guys aren't quite the same thing.

Cheating is a big deal, especially if people are finding ways to exploit the new mode. Ticket support with your evidence, it will be investigated.

"3* buy barely round 10."

I mean yeah, that's called hyper rolling.
Saw an early Swain in the second round - which mysteriously disappeared when I mentioned it in the chat.  Only wish I screenshotted it.
